Articles.Content: So can I just copy my .png files over from my old 0.19 install of the Kethane Mod? I don't want to spend the time scanning everything again if it's an easy fix like that.

As far as is know the data on the fuel locations is saved in your persistence file, you need to find the part of the Kethane mod and copy it over to your current persistence file. When you did that you can copy the .png files too.

As far as is know the data on the fuel locations is saved in your persistence file, you need to find the part of the Kethane mod and copy it over to your current persistence file. When you did that you can copy the .png files too.

Thanks.

Are all Kethane deposits located in the same place for everyone?

Thanks.

Are all Kethane deposits located in the same place for everyone?

No, as far as I know it gets randomly generated.

I know this thread is a month old but I had a question pertaining to it and I didn't feel like starting a new one: Is there any way to add kethane deposits manually? As far as I can tell the kethane deposits are recorded via pixel color in PluginData\MMI_Kethane. Is it as simple as adding new regions to the proper planet.png? The reason I ask is I have a base that I placed in the stock game, hoping that one day I'd be able to use it as a resource outpost. However, once I downloaded Kethane I discovered to my chagrin that there are no deposits near my base. Any help is appreciated!

EDIT: I want a deposit right where the reticule is now: http://i.imgur.com/yqgcTfh.png

Edited June 18, 2013 by tntristan12
